titleStmt.title: A proclamation of his Majesty the King of Spaine For the Conservation of the contrabando. Revocation of the permissions. Prohibition of the use of the merchandises, and fruits of the realms of France, England, and Portugal; and reformation of vestures, and apparel, and other things. Published in Madrid, the 11th. of September, anno 1657. Translated out of Spanish.
Proclamations. 1657-09-11. English.
titleStmt.author: Spain. Sovereign (1621-1665 : Philip IV)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G. Dawson, for Iohn Sweeting at the Angel in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The words "Conservation .. things." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
